attributes.action: Review & Reform the Probation Service, apologise & enshrine Victims Code in law
attributes.additional_details: We want reform of the Probation Service and justice system so that our communities are safeguarded and victims are placed at the forefront of justice.
attributes.background:
We call on the Government to
1. Formally apologise to the families of those killed by individuals under the supervision of the Probation Service.
2. Commission a review into the Probation Service.
3. Enshrine the Victims Code of Practice in law
4. Reform the Probation Service based on the review
